doc.title: ...Loves Martha
doc.plot: Loves Martha is an off-beat comedy that shines a light on the strange and hidden love-life of Richard Stoker, an introverted data entry clerk whose dreary life of 9 to 5 drudgery drives him to forge an unnatural romantic attachment to a copy machine... or does it?

Loves Martha is an off-beat comedy that shines a light on the strange and hidden love-life of Richard Stoker, an introverted data entry clerk whose dreary life of 9 to 5 drudgery drives him to forge an unnatural romantic attachment to a copy machine... or does it?
